thread.title: Richard Morley

author: Richard Morley
title: Richard Morley
text:
2nd time I have used tyres on the Drive and I can not rate them high enough. Today the time slot coincided with the school run and the fitter kindly waited for my fiancee to drop our daughter off.
Another thing I would like to add is that what with this time of year money being tight, it was a relief to be able to get the tyres on finance.
